product_name: Metolius Super Chalk Fine Grind - 4 oz.
long_description: This finely ground chalk is specially formulated for climbers who prefer a pure powder chalk. Original chalk specifically formulated for rock climbing. Drying agent is added to the highest-quality magnesium carbonate for maximum sweat absorption and friction.
short_description: This finely ground chalk is specially formulated for climbers who prefer a pure powder chalk.
